item.title: 시나위 - Farewell To Love
item.description:
Show me no more tears
my love
Take me back
to the time before
Came into the life
oh babe
Play no more games
my child
That you’ll never
win or lose
Take me back
oh take me back
Just like
endless railroad
Like the day
and the night
We never be together
forever
So go away (I say)
farewell to my love
Take away you arrow
you’re not the one
Go away let me be
I’m ready to fall-

Never look back
don’t regret
I did truely
loved you babe
We did the best
but never meant to be
It felt so good
from the start
Thought I was up
in the sky
But I had too many
scars and pain
Just like
black and white
Like the moon
and the sun
We never be together
forever
So fly away (I say)
farewell to my love
Take away you arrow
you’re not the one
Go away let me be
I’m ready to fall-

(I’m ready to fall)
farewell to my love
Take away you arrow
you’re not the one
Go away let me be
I’m ready to fall
Farewell to my love
take away you arrow
You’re not the one
go away
Let me be
I’m ready to fall-

꽃잎 꽃잎 꽃잎 꽃잎
꽃잎 꽃잎 꽃잎 꽃잎

item.title: 시나위 - 그대 앞에 난 촛불이어라
item.description:
그대 앞에 흰 국화
꽃 한 송이는
크게 뜨는
내 눈에 눈물이었고
시작도 끝도 없는
사랑이기에
그대 앞에 난 촛불이어라
그대를 진정 사랑하리라
나만이 홀로 잊지 않으리

핑크빛 커피잔에
흐르는 노래는
화사한 여인의
달콤한 미소도
내 뺨위에 눈물은
지울 수 없어라
그대 앞에 난 촛불이어라
그대를 진정 사랑하리라
나만이 홀로
잊지않으리
그대 앞에 난 촛불이어라
그대 앞에 난 촛불이어라
